pr_title: HDDS-2969. Implement ofs://: Add contract test

timeline.bodyText: Do we need to override teardown and createConfiguration or it is just for the additional LOG?
timeline.author: xiaoyuyao

replies.bodyText:
Copied from o3fs contract test. I believe it is just for the log.
Will remove this.
replies.author: smengcl

timeline.bodyText: listEmptyRoot should be OK for OFS?
timeline.author: xiaoyuyao

replies.author: smengcl

replies.bodyText: are you seeing the root is not empty even though the test claim to list empty root dir?
replies.author: xiaoyuyao

replies.bodyText: Yes. I see testvol1, which is specified in RootedOzoneContract#getTestPath.
replies.author: smengcl

timeline.bodyText: mkdirDepth1 should be OK for admin? Can we add some configuration to allow this?
timeline.author: xiaoyuyao

replies.author: smengcl

replies.bodyText: this should be like create and delete an empty volume? why do we fail here?
replies.author: xiaoyuyao

replies.bodyText: Because OFS doesn't support deleting volumes (or buckets) at the moment. Even if they are empty.
replies.author: smengcl

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to add contract test in the context of HA setup as well as the non-HA?
timeline.author: xiaoyuyao

replies.bodyText: I think we need another set of classes to do this but initialize with MiniOzoneHAClusterImpl instead.
replies.author: smengcl

timeline.message: Change scheme to OFS. Most tests pass. DistCp and RootDir has failures.
Handle DistCp /NONE path. DistCp contract passes.
getFileStatus should throw FileNotFoundException for VOLUME_NOT_FOUND or BUCKET_NOT_FOUND as well.
Disabled unsupported tests in RootDir contract since OFS doesn't support rm volumes.
Enable testRmEmptyRootDirNonRecursive, testListEmptyRootDirectory and testMkDirDepth1 after rebase.
